snippet.title: Mega Man Zero 1 (FULL PLAYTHROUGH - No Commentary) | Mega Man Zero/ZX Legacy Collection (PS4)
snippet.description:
The Mega Man Zero series was one of my favorite series of games during my childhood. The Zero series took the tight gameplay of the Mega Man X series, brought it to a handheld, and added a satisfyingly dark story that both fans and casuals can appreciate. I must've sacrificed THOUSANDS of hours of my life to these games.  And now, The Mega Man Zero/ZX Legacy Collection released today and I am so excited to finally play the Zero series in HD! Without further adieu, here is my playthrough of Mega Man Zero 1 for the GBA!

This playthrough did not use any Cyber Elves in order to maintain as high a mission rank as possible. As such, my life bar remained at 16 units the whole game, I had no Sub Tanks, and I managed to hold an A rank for the entire playthrough. This allows bosses to use their EX Skills in battle which makes them more interesting. I honestly think Zero 1 is more fun to play this way specifically as the boss patterns are not overly complex and the missions are simpler than in later entries.

New here? Join the Legion - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM-qT2R5lLSI_UkNigQvXnQ?sub_confirmation=1

Played by Lord Bojacx with no commentary

Gameplay captured from an original model PS4 via Elgato Game Capture HD

Playthrough/walkthrough edited with Adobe Premiere Pro

Support my channel on Patreon!

https://www.patreon.com/lordbojacx

#MegaManZero  #MegaManZeroZXLegacyCollection #MegaManZero1
